text: Riza was moving to AWS Cloud to improve
our turnaround time maintainability and
serviceability it was important for us
to accelerate time to Market and learn
the skills to deploy unmaintainable
sustainable solution we needed a
training for employees with different
level of AWS knowledge to learn faster
and start using AWS services with more
confidence we wanted our big data teams
focused on data design of machine
learning algorithms and solutions and
they bring us to move faster our program
for the Big Data team included two main
instructor-led classes big data on AWS
ml Ops engineering on AWS and immersion
day with eks personalized to help our
team start putting their knowledge into
practice these training sessions
directed to the team's needs and we were
able to make action plans immediately
after the training so a total of
approximately 90 raised staff have been
trained by AWS training and
certification for data analytics and
machine learning developing on AWS
courses AWS training and certification
has helped raise up skew our employees
speed up operations and ensure that
everyone is on the same page team
members were able to understand AWS
microservices better and get better
alignment on the solution and vision as
of today Razer employees are able to
architect and understand the
architecture which also helps us to
facilitate collaboration and improve our
teamwork
